title: Best Tech Gifts 2020: Our Favorite Gadgets
sub_head: From smart steam ovens and self-lighting candles to the best phones, laptops and headphones to buy, it’s the WSJ Personal Tech team’s annual list of tested, recommended products
body:
Each fall, we look back at the year’s best tech products, and compile a list of the ones we think are actually worth your money (and ours). Though testing is always a requirement, the craziness that is 2020 meant that we tried everything in our homes, where others could weigh in. So this list—which includes everything from a self-emptying robovac to a smart steam oven to the best noise-canceling headphones—isn’t just approved by your favorite personal tech writers, but also by their spouses, kids and various quaran-team members. Have at it!
Things...
